name: Chalet
description:
welcome to chalet!
harvest magic to build a cozy winter village~

updates coming soon

music from animal crossing

***

IN-GAME:
arrows/wasd to move
space to interact
mouse to look around
R to return to the workbench

BUILD MODE:
mouse to build
mouse+x to erase

arrows+
-B to change brush mode
-T to change brush type

mouse+l to select pairs
up to link pairs

*space to exit build mode*
